channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Survation, 10–11 July 2019 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Conservative Party (ECR): 12–20 seats
  • Labour Party (S&D): 19–27 seats
  • Liberal Democrats (RE): 10–14 seats
  • Scottish National Party (Greens/EFA): 2–3 seats
  • Plaid Cymru (Greens/EFA): 0–2 seats
  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 0 seats
  • Brexit Party (NI): 11–17 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Survation, 10–11 July 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:

  • Labour Party (S&D): 26.0–31.6%
  • Liberal Democrats (RE): 16.5–21.3%

  • Brexit Party (NI): 17.4–22.3%
